minesweeper

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • minesweeper.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.util.Observable
    Model for Minesweeper. This will set up randomly placed bombs alongside the numbers to indicate to the user that there are bombs surrounding those numbers. This will also set up the timer, and the size of the game board. This will also set up a button for the user to restart the game with a new randomly generate board.
    Author:
    Rosa Fleming
